heading: HR00694
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND OTHER APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO ESTABLISH CABALLO ISLAND AS A PERMANENT QUARANTINE AREA FOR NOVEL CORONAVIRUS ACUTE RESPIRATORY DISEASE (nCoV ARD) AND OTHER INFECTIOUS DISEASES AND FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO MAKE A DETAILED REVIEW OF ITS VIABILITY AND FEASIBILITY
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2020-02-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00694
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND OTHER APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO ESTABLISH CABALLO ISLAND AS A PERMANENT QUARANTINE AREA FOR NOVEL CORONAVIRUS ACUTE RESPIRATORY DISEASE (nCoV ARD) AND OTHER INFECTIOUS DISEASES AND FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO MAKE A DETAILED REVIEW OF ITS VIABILITY AND FEASIBILITY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LOPEZ, MANUEL LUIS T.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2020-02-18
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2020-02-10;
